job.title: IT Security Engineer
job.description:
What you need to succeed in the role::
Relevant university degree or an excellent reason for not having one
Security or related background, with hands-on experience in cybersecurity management and operations tools
Strong IT skills, including knowledge of hardware, software, networks, and cloud services
Knowledge of incident response, handling methodologies, and cybersecurity principles
Readiness to solve problems quickly while always looking for ways to improve the systems
You can work independently, take responsibility, and perform well despite ambiguity or constant changes. You are good at communication, fluent in English, comfortable interacting with business and technology, and have excellent analytical skills.

What will be your challenge in the role::
We are looking for
IT Security Engineer
To join our team in Tallinn
What will be your challenge in the role:
You will join the team of security specialists and enthusiasts to work with international stakeholders to resolve cybersecurity operations challenges and vulnerability compliance. You will navigate the SecOps landscape in our global company, be a responsible engineer for at least one of the cybersecurity defence capabilities, and successfully participate in a rotating security analyst role. Your tasks will include the following:
Build, configure, test, and maintain dedicated cyber defence systems
Make sense of the influx of information through the myriad data sources
Strive for automation of repeatable tasks
Gain situational awareness, determine the effectiveness of observed potential attacks, and perform event correlation using information gathered from various sources within the company.
Perform cyber defence incident triage.
Track and document cyber defence incidents from initial detection through final resolution

What do we offer: :
Inclusive and valuing culture
At Riverty, you can be who you are. We strive to create an inclusive environment and an appreciative culture, enhanced by our employee networks.
Health & Wellbeing
Your physical and mental health is important to us. Take advantage of our various preventive care and support services.
Professional and Personal Development
Take advantage of our numerous training and development opportunities. Benefit, for example, from training courses offered by Bertelsmann University, language courses or leadership trainings
Monetary Benefits & Discounts
Know that you're appreciated with plenty of employee benefits & discounts just for you.
Flexibility
Our diverse working models empower you to customize your work to perfectly align with your preferences. Benefit from mobile office, flexible working hours and part-time models.
